Package com.example.lab9.controller

Class TeacherController

java.lang.Object
com.example.lab9.controller.TeacherController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/teacher") public class TeacherController extends Object
Controller for managing teacher-related operations.

    • registerTeacher

      @PostMapping("/register") public String registerTeacher(@RequestParam String teacherName)
      Registers a new teacher by their name.
      Parameters:
      teacherName - the name of the teacher
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the registration

    • createCourse

      @PostMapping("/createCourse") public String createCourse(@RequestParam String teacherName, @RequestParam String courseName)
      Creates a new course for a teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacherName - the name of the teacher
      courseName - the name of the course
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the course creation

    • createAssignment

      @PostMapping("/createAssignment") public String createAssignment(@RequestParam String teacherName, @RequestParam Long courseId, @RequestParam String title, @RequestParam String content)
      Creates a new assignment for a course by a teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacherName - the name of the teacher
      courseId - the ID of the course
      title - the title of the assignment
      content - the content of the assignment
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the assignment creation

    • getAllAssignments

      @GetMapping("/assignments") public List<Map<String,Object>> getAllAssignments()
      Retrieves all assignments created by teachers.
      Returns:
      a list of assignments with their details
